items.title: The iPad Pro at 10: a decade of unrealized potential
items.summary: The theory of the iPad has always been simple: size matters. Even in its very first public debut in 2010, the iPad was mostly just an iPhone with a larger screen, and Apple CEO Steve Jobs believed that was enough. Remember the way Jobs sat down on an easy chair to read his iPad, scrolling […]

items.title: Switch 1 and 2 games 20% off: Super Mario Galaxy 1 & 2, Pokemon Legends: Z-A, Kirby, more
items.summary:
In today’s game deals, we are checking back in with a notable QVC promotion. While it might not be the first place you think of for game deals, it is now offering 20% off a selection of Switch titles using code GIFT at checkout. While these offers at QVC can be hit or miss, and the best stuff does sell out quickly, this code is delivering some of the best prices on new Switch 2 games like Pokemon Legends: Z-A and the brand new Super Mario Galaxy 1 and 2 (for Switch) release that just dropped as part of the 40th anniversary celebration. Get in there while you can, remember to use the code above at checkout, and you’ll find a quick link to the QVC game deals right here. 

  • Pokemon Legends: Z-A – Nintendo Switch 2 $56 (Reg. $70)
  • Super Mario Galaxy 1 & 2 (Switch) $61 (Reg. $70)
  • Kirby and the Forgotten Land Nintendo Switch 2 Edition $64 (Reg. $80)

items.title: Lumines Arise is an almost perfect zen puzzle game

items.title: Germany to spend €26.5 billion on clothes for soldiers, armoured vehicles

items.title: Thousands in Serbia protest law to speed Kushner development of old army compound
